title: Silver Beaver Award
description: Congratulate Scoutmaster Doug Ullrich on getting this year’s Silver Beaver Award.

title: 2025 Food Drive
description: Both Troop 747 and 3747 worked together to collect nearly 900 pounds of food during their food drive this year.

title: Cub Scout Crossover
description: The Fall 2024 semester’s crossover went great, bridging in 3 new scouts from Cub Scout Pack 276.

title: Veterans’ Day Parade
description: Troop 747 and 3747 were welcomed onto the Legionnaires float this year during the Veterans’ Day parade.

title: Bench
description: Troop 747 and 3747 worked together on a service project to make and install a bench on a local trail.

title: Leadership Retreat
description: This year’s leadership retreat went great as all of our new leaders learned valuable skills through lectures and fun games.

title: NOAC 2024
description: For this year’s National Order of the Arrow Conference, Troop 747’s Noah Schaffer represented our lodge mascot, Manny the Antelope.

title: Camp Wehinahpay
description: Troop 747 did an outstanding Color Guard Ceremony at Camp Wehinahpay today.

title: Camp Geronimo
description: Troop 747 is rocking summer camp at Geronimo this year.

title: Visit From the GDP
description: For tonight’s meeting, the troop was visited by three officers from the Glendale Police Department.

title: Backpacking Campout pt.2
description: This weekend the troop went on a backpacking campout.

title: Backpacking Campout pt.1
description: The troop was prepared for their backpacking campout this weekend. For many of them, it was their first time backpacking.

title: Plane Show
description: The troop attended this year’s plane show and had a blast.

title: Tower Building
description: This week’s meeting focused on team building by seeing which patrol could build the tallest tower in the given time.

title: Winter Campout
description: This year’s winter campout went great, ending with scouts gathered around a fire.

title: Flag Service
description: To honor people in the military, Troop 747 held a very large public flag service.

title: USS Iowa
description: Over the summer, the troop spent a night on the USS Iowa, which was a unique and fun experience.

title: Camp Emerald Bay
description: The troop went to Camp Emerald Bay in California for the first time this year and had a blast!

title: Ice Cream Eating Contest
description: This year marked the continuation of our annual Ice Cream Eating Contest with Troop 738.
